text.section: A violation of this title or a local law enacted or regulation adopted under this title is a misdemeanor.

section.section: The Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City may provide by local law for the enforcement of this title and any local law enacted or regulation adopted under this title.

The Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City may:
require punishment by fine or imprisonment or both; and
enact or adopt civil penalties for a violation.
The Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City may provide by local law that a violation of this title or a local law enacted or regulation adopted under this title is a civil zoning violation.
